channel.title: ! crazy shit happend!
channel.description:
I have just recently been diagnosed with colon cancer, Familial Colon Cancer (FCC) and i have about 5-6 months to live. recovery is very unlikely, as i have let it go to long. just wanted to tell you all that i have had a nice stay, although short. i will be leaving this forum in about half a month to a month.\ this post is for anyone who has colon, or any other cancer, and i just wanted to reach out to you if you have been diagnosed with the disease. keep your chin up, and face every day like youll never have it back. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XRRr6jH.png[/img]
I HAVE JUST GOTTEN AN EMAIL FORWARDING MY LAST DIAGNOSIS INFORMATION! IT'S ALL FINE!!!!!! IM NOT SICK AT ALL! *catches breath* im fine as can be, the blood sample they took from me was contaminated. the only thing that they looked for was a cancer, as i have had a few fibroids in my intestines (little tumors at the canal of your large intestines) and hemeroids, i had a few symptoms of colon cancer, so they wanted to check me out. I have gotten a mere mis-diagnosis. the nurse who took my sample accidentally contmnated it, and wasnt even aware of it. i know this sounds like a total attention scheme, i just feel so alive again! its like i have new life! it feels amazing! its really good to know you guys are serious, thanks for the support. ugh, sorry about that. ugh, ugh, ugh, im sincerly sorry guys, that some of you even prolly felt bad/sorry for me, im sorry about that. :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: but thanks, thanks for everything, and comforting me, it does still suck to have hemeroids and fibroids, but hey, its better than having your days numbered and having colon cancer! this can still be place for whom those can post thier feelings about thier own condictions, or those of a loved one.

@Aleka wrote:

Congratulations on surviving man. I would have been depressed.

Read full topic

item.title: ! crazy shit happend!
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:17, topic:547094”]So… Let me get this straight, you have fibroids all along your uterine wall (your uterus) and you also have hemorrhoids in your ass? How the hell did a blood sample get contaminated in the first place? More than likely you went to a hospital/cancer treatment facility and if they had any contaminations at all… That’s a huge health and safety risk and could open up potential lawsuits. Lastly, what doctors/hospitals/any health place emails such an important thing as blood contamination/cancer mix up?

[/quote]

they came with phonecalls, plus

i live in montana. thats why. we have shit healthcare “facilities” here. the closest one to my place is 70 miles

trust me, i didnt belive it either

Read full topic

item.title: ! crazy shit happend!
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Talks about colon cancer
Titles it crazy shit

I get the pun.

Read full topic

item.title: ! crazy shit happend!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

So… Let me get this straight, you have fibroids all along your uterine wall (your uterus) and you also have hemorrhoids in your ass? How the hell did a blood sample get contaminated in the first place? More than likely you went to a hospital/cancer treatment facility and if they had any contaminations at all… That’s a huge health and safety risk and could open up potential lawsuits. Lastly, what doctors/hospitals/any health place emails such an important thing as blood contamination/cancer mix up?

Read full topic

item.title: ! crazy shit happend!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:10, topic:547094”]This forum has matured so much in the last few years lol. This thread would have gotten 100% flame in the past; good to see we can take some things seriously here

On topic: Sorry to hear about your disease Enjoy your time with your friends and family and stay off the Moparscape![/quote]
I’m not a dickhead troll all of the time, just whenever I’m needed ;).

OT:
Good news mate, I bet you’ve got a new walk of life now.

Enjoy it while it lasts.

Read full topic

item.title: ! crazy shit happend!
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

Davidi2:

Well. Good news!

agreed.

good thing my parents are the only ones who know, or we would have to make quite a few phone calls.

also i was going to take my parents out to dinner because of this, but then called my dad and told him it was a false alarm he said: “does this mean were not going out to dinner? (jokingly)” but yeah, i feel friggen awsome, i feel great!!!

Read full topic

item.title: ! crazy shit happend!
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

thanks for all of your support, i will keep in thouch. my family and i are optimistc. i will let you guys know how i am doing.
they dint say recovery is impossible, im looking into treatment options. for now, thanks so much for your responses. :o

Read full topic

item.title: ! crazy shit happend!
item.dc:creator: @Aleka Aleka
item.description:
@Aleka wrote:

Woah. I have no idea what your going through now but your going to be missed. Remember dying is just going to the other side. I honestly have no idea what else to say. Spend time with your family. We all have to go your time is short but so is all of ours we never know what will happen tomorrow. I hope your family is doing good.

Read full topic

item.title: ! crazy shit happend!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Shit one mate, sorry to hear that.

Keep your chin up lad, never knew you but it’s never a good thing hearing about this kind of stuff. Best of luck to you the next couple months. Hopefully you pull through and have a good life. If you’re not too busy or anything, drop back in from time to time over the next few months and let us know how you’re doing, it’d be nice to keep in touch.

Keep fighting.

Read full topic

Are you serious?

Yeah, i just got the news this morning. ill be moving in with my folks next week.
